definition: to murder without blinking an eye (idiom)/ruthless/cold-blooded
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
(negative prefix)/not/no
to blink/to wink
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: Even someone as wicked as this murderous bandit can change his ways.
sentences.chinese: 就連這個殺人不眨眼的強盜都能改惡從善。

definition: no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss/in a hopeless situation
to take revenge and wipe out a grudge (idiom)
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
to feel guilty as a thief (idiom); to have sth on one's conscience
to have no sense of shame/brazen
chicken-hearted (idiom)/gutless
hoodlum/bad guy
crafty/slippery/slyboots
(of an argument, theory etc) full of flaws (idiom)
lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
lit. to have three heads and six arms (idiom)/fig. to possess remarkable abilities/a being of formidable powers

white face/face painting in Beijing opera etc

to take refuge in religious life
